title: The Weaponized Justice Department | Daily Best of August 10 | Rick & Bubba
description:
After the FBI raid on Trump's estate, is it safe to say that the Biden administration is weaponizing the Justice Department against political opponents? Even CNN admits the case for raiding Mar-a-Lago is weak. In other news, we'd like to remind everyone that there's no crying OR HUGGING in baseball. Producer Speedy teaches his wife how to jump rope, and TV Producer Adler has to break up a dogfight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
